In England, in the seven days to 22 July, there were 251,968 new confirmed cases (447.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 July, there were 267,492 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 6% (15,524 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 July is 5,013,664 (8,907.3 cases per 100,000 population).
